Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
deluxeRoom, executiveRoom, standardRoom
public class Room extends Object
Represents a room in a hotel.

    • getAvailability

      public boolean getAvailability(int index)
      Gets the availability of the room on a specific day.
      Parameters:
      index - the index/day to check availability for
      Returns:
      true if the room is available, false otherwise

    • getAvailabilityRange

      public boolean getAvailabilityRange(int index1, int index2)
      gets the availability of the room for a certain range.
      Parameters:
      index1 - the index for the smaller day of range
      index2 - the index for the bigger day of range
      Returns:
      boolean value of true if the range is available, false otherwise

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double price)
      sets the price of the room.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price of the room

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String guestName, int checkin, int checkout)
      Adds a reservation for the room.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkin - the check-in day (0-30)
      checkout - the check-out day (0-31)

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String guestName, int checkin, int checkout, String discountCode)
      Adds a reservation for the room with a discount code.
      Parameters:
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkin - the check-in day (0-30)
      checkout - the check-out day (0-31)
      discountCode - the discount code used in the reservation

    • updateAvailability

      public void updateAvailability()
      Updates the availability of the room based on the current reservations.

      adds a price to total price

      addedPrice - the price added to the total
